text: On 7 June 2017, two attacks were simultaneously carried out against the Iranian parliament and the Mausoleum of Ruhollah Khomeini, leaving 12 people dead and 42 wounded. ISIL claimed responsibility for both attacks. The attacks were the first terrorist attacks in Tehran in more than a decade, and the first major attack in the country since the 2010 Zahedan bombings. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:2017 in Asia Category:2017 mass shootings Category:2010s explosions in Asia Category:2010s in Iran Category:2010s mass shootings in Asia Category:2010s murders in Asia Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in 2017 Category:Building bombings in Asia Category:Disasters in Iran Category:Explosions in 2017 Category:Islamic State Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in 2017 Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in Asia Category:June 2017 events Category:Mass murder in 2017 Category:Mass murder in Asia Category:Murder- suicides in Asia Category:Suicide bombings in Asia Category:Suicide bombings in the 2010s Category:Suicide in 2017 2017 attacks Category:Terrorist incidents in Asia in the 2010s
title: 2017 Tehran attacks
